gnutellaClient

Class Servent

  • java.lang.Object
    • gnutellaClient.Servent

  • public class Servent
extends java.lang.Object
    Client of Gnutella network. Protocol v0.4 Features: +Connect to the network +Share files +Answer to querys +Search and download. For downloads uses protocol HTTP
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ismael Fernandez, Miguel Vilchis
    See Also:
    http://www.stanford.edu/class/cs244b/gnutella_protocol_0.4.pdf, ://www.dropbox.com/sh/yyzy5e48qk7p5h0/EtzNfXlzAO/comp-dist-unam-proyecto -diapos.pdf

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Servent(java.lang.String pathName)
      Constructs a Servent that listens for upcoming connections in the specified port, and shares files of the especified directoryPath

      • Servent

        public Servent(java.lang.String pathName)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a Servent that listens for upcoming connections in the specified port, and shares files of the especified directoryPath
        Parameters:
        pathName - Directory Path for sharinf files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO error when opening the socket in which this Servent listens for upcoming connections

        public boolean connect(java.lang.String ip,
              short port)
        Connects to a Gnutella client with the specified ip and port
        Parameters:
        ip - The ip in string format of the Gnutella client
        port - The port in which the Gnutella client listens
        Returns:
        true if the connection is made succesfully, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        port - The port in which the Server listens for upcoming connections
        file - Name of the file that for searching
        size - Size of the file for the search
